subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Hull City won promotion to the top tier of English soccer for the first time since it was formed 104 years ago when it beat Bristol City, 1-0, in the Championship League’s playoff final on Saturday.
snippet: Hull City won promotion to the top tier of English soccer for the first time since it was formed 104 years ago when it beat Bristol City, 1-0, in the Championship League’s playoff final on Saturday.
